law.catch_line: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum....

text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum.

The Board shall meet:
At the times and places that it determines; and
As requested by the Secretary.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation in accordance with the State budget; and
Reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

section.section: The Secretary may employ a staff for the Board in accordance with the State budget. The Secretary may designate one of the staff as an executive director.
The Secretary shall determine the appropriate job classifications and grades for all staff.

text.section:
To provide adequate assistance in the investigation, development, and prosecution of cases referred to the Board, the Board shall be assigned a sufficient number of:
Assistant Attorneys General by the Attorney General; and
Investigators and hearing officers by the Secretary.
